column4: ﻿ after weeks of trying to get 8.04 (64 bit & 386) to run on a gigabyte GA-K8VM800M mobo I dug out an old 566mhz hp with 4.3gb hard drive, which worked first go.﻿ the 4.3 is almost full. (naturally). I have added another drive, formatted a partition, added a fs. can I call it /home, and copy the files from the home folder in / on the 4.3? then delete the folder?
you were here by another name a while ago?..see my reply to Get_A_Fix
